summary: Rubber Inventory is a modification of the carrying system. Now the inventory will be elastic, so that carrying capacity will always be identical to the total weight of the inventory.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=18][color=#EEE21A]Rubber Inventory 1.2 (BETA)[/color][/size][/b][/center]

Rubber Inventory is a modification of the carrying system. Now the inventory will be elastic, so that carrying capacity will always be identical to the total weight of the inventory.

Note: The mod will start operating as soon as the game is loaded, however its activation will be notified at the top left of the screen (\"Rubber Inventory Activated\").
But the activation time can vary according to some mods installed and loading order.

Any problems?
See:
1 Comments.
2 OPTIONAL FILES

[center][youtube]4rHrmjhTn9Y[/youtube]

Fixed (1.2):
[youtube]a1we01nakaE[/youtube]

[/center]

[center][b][size=12][color=#EEE21A]Manually installation[/color][/size][/b][/center]

Correct file location: 
.../Skyrim/data/Rubber Inventory.esp
.../Skyrim/data/Scripts/RubberInventory.pex

[center][b][size=12][color=#EEE21A]Manually uninstall[/color][/size][/b][/center]

Delete File:
.../Skyrim/data/Rubber Inventory.esp
.../Skyrim/data/Scripts/RubberInventory.pex

[b][color=#EEE21A]Incompatible[/color][/b]
[b][color=#EEE21A]----------------------[/color][/b]

This mod will invalidate the operation of another mod that changes the player\'s charging system. (regardless of load order)
author: DamianQ
